statements.select:
SELECT ci.IDX , BRAND , SERIES , MODEL , ORIGINAL_FILENAME , ci.REG_DATE , REG_ID FROM BMW_FS_CAR_IMAGES ci JOIN BMW_FS_FILES_DATA fd ON ci.IDX = fd.MASTER_IDX WHERE 1=1
AND BRAND LIKE '%'+#brand#+'%'
AND SERIES LIKE '%'+#series#+'%'
ORDER BY BRAND, SERIES, MODEL
SELECT IDX , BRAND , SERIES , MODEL , REG_DATE , REG_ID , '' AS ORIGINAL_FILENAME FROM BMW_FS_CAR_IMAGES WHERE IDX = #idx#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO BMW_FS_CAR_IMAGES ( IDX , BRAND , SERIES , MODEL , REG_ID ) VALUES ( #idx# ,#brand# ,#series# ,#model# ,#regId# )
statements.update: UPDATE BMW_FS_CAR_IMAGES SET BRAND = #brand# ,SERIES = #series# ,MODEL = #model# ,UPT_DATE = getDate() ,UPT_ID = #uptId# WHERE IDX = #idx#
